body_html: This does look like a useful feature. There are a number of such configuration options exposed as Environment variables, with appropriate refactoring it would be straightforward to expose them as "check environment, if not set, read from config file, if not found, apply default" in a uniform manner.

body: This does look like a useful feature. There are a number of such configuration options exposed as Environment variables, with appropriate refactoring it would be straightforward to expose them as "check environment, if not set, read from config file, if not found, apply default" in a uniform manner.
